purpose: Facilitates the deployment and management of AI agents on macOS systems using containerization.
principle: Leverages Docker and Apple's Virtualization framework to create isolated environments for AI agents, enabling efficient resource management and execution.
reusability: Designed as a containerized solution, allowing for easy deployment and scaling of AI agents across macOS systems.
limitations: Primarily supports macOS due to reliance on Apple's Virtualization framework; may have limited support for other operating systems.
name: cua
description: c/ua is the Docker Container for Computer-Use AI Agents.
highlight: Provides a Docker-based environment for running AI agents on macOS using Apple's Virtualization framework.
